verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> drew near <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> for to hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5721><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> murmured <S%G1234><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, This man <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3778><s%> receiveth <S%G4327><s%> <S%G5736><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> eateth <S%G4906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> with them <S%G846><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>, if <S%G2532><s%> he lose <S%G622><s%> <S%G5660><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, doth <S%G2641><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5736><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> that which is lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G5756><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5632><s%> it <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> when he hath found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, he layeth <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5719><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> shoulders <S%G5606><s%>, rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> <S%G1519><s%> home <S%G3624><s%>, he calleth together <S%G4779><s%> <S%G5719><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> neighbours <S%G1069><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> <S%G5645><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G5756><s%>.

I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> likewise <S%G3779><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, more than <S%G2228><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> just persons <S%G1342><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>.

Either <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pieces of silver <S%G1406><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> she lose <S%G622><s%> <S%G5661><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> piece <S%G1406><s%>, doth not <S%G3780><s%> light <S%G681><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a candle <S%G3088><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sweep <S%G4563><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%> diligently <S%G1960><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> she find <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5632><s%> it ?

And <S%G2532><s%> when she hath found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> it, she calleth <S%G4779><s%> her friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her neighbours <S%G1069><s%> together <S%G4779><s%> <S%G5731><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Rejoice <S%G4796><s%> <S%G5645><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the piece <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3779><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, there is <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5736><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5628><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the portion <S%G3313><s%> of goods <S%G3776><s%> that falleth <S%G1911><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to me. And <S%G2532><s%> he divided <S%G1244><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> his living <S%G979><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G537><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and took his journey <S%G589><s%> <S%G5656><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country <S%G5561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> wasted <S%G1287><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> substance <S%G3776><s%> with riotous <S%G811><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had spent <S%G1159><s%> <S%G5660><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, there arose <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a mighty <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> land <S%G5561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to be in want <S%G5302><s%> <S%G5745><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and joined himself <S%G2853><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to <S%G1520><s%> a citizen <S%G4177><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> country <S%G5561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> <S%G5721><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he would fain <S%G1937><s%> <S%G5707><s%> have filled <S%G1072><s%> <S%G5658><s%> his <S%G846><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the husks <S%G2769><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> the swine <S%G5519><s%> did eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5707><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, How many <S%G4214><s%> hired servants <S%G3407><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> father's <S%G3962><s%> have bread <S%G740><s%> enough and to spare <S%G4052><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> <S%G5731><s%> with hunger <S%G3042><s%>!

I will arise <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5695><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5692><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, I have sinned <S%G264><s%> <S%G5627><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>,

But <S%G1161><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, Bring forth <S%G1627><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the best <S%G4413><s%> robe <S%G4749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put it on <S%G1746><s%> <S%G5657><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5628><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> bring hither <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>, and kill <S%G2380><s%> <S%G5657><s%> it; and <S%G2532><s%> let us eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and be merry <S%G2165><s%> <S%G5686><s%>:

Now <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field <S%G68><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> and drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to the house <S%G3614><s%>, he heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> musick <S%G4858><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dancing <S%G5525><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> <S%G5666><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the servants <S%G3816><s%>, and asked <S%G4441><s%> <S%G5711><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> meant <S%G1498><s%> <S%G5751><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> is come <S%G2240><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> hath killed <S%G2380><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he hath received <S%G618><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> safe and sound <S%G5198><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he was angry <S%G3710><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5707><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> go in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5629><s%>: therefore <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and intreated <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5707><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%>, Lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, these many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> do I serve <S%G1398><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, neither <S%G3763><s%> transgressed I <S%G3928><s%> <S%G5627><s%> at any time <S%G3763><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> yet <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G1325><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> gavest <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> a kid <S%G2056><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might make merry <S%G2165><s%> <S%G5686><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> as soon as <S%G3753><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> hath devoured <S%G2719><s%> <S%G5631><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> living <S%G979><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> harlots <S%G4204><s%>, thou hast killed <S%G2380><s%> <S%G5656><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>.

It was <S%G1161><s%> meet <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5713><s%> that we should make merry <S%G2165><s%> <S%G5683><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be glad <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5646><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again <S%G326><s%> <S%G5656><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G5756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.
